1594313562_1ETarTu7fyokpgRoBMiGZc8L3FwnD.body: and what about the human body?
What about dioxygene we breath, does the body handle with dioxygene hit by 60Ghz ?

I ask the question because i do not know the answer, i read that there is an issue about it, that birds and people die because the oxygene hit by 60GHz is no more distributed in the body.I am not a scientist and have no theory, i just want to know if the issue exists.

I found that, if you are interested in this topic,  https://open.lbry.com/@Evolutionary_Life_Video_Archive:3/y2mate.com---How-do-60-GHz-wireless-signals-affect-our-air__5oYt06JFiKA_1080p(1):2
and i think it will be better for everyone if nobody says things like "you need to blabla" or please tell me that you don't blabla", i am just looking for an answer to a question in a domain i don't know, why do you do that? are you not curious?you put people in group? but why?
@redlibertyreal: Is it to be "paranoid schizophrenic" to ask a scientific question ?

1612124072_1BudWvimweYZjs7PghDjpd8nbuHH4.body: Know your enemies, search and destroy those who pull the strings, frighten the untouchables, cut off the heads of puppeteers. Do you really think there is an opportunity to win with peaceful and legal ideas against such power? Puppets are made of flesh and blood. Puppeteers and puppets are equal from this point of view. It is a radical opinion, and sometimes it is my opinion.
